text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden He attacked Ilhan Omar on Father's day weekend four days after her father died from Covid19.

He followed that up by saying he asked his people to "slow down the testing."

He has no grasp of history. 

All in front of a crowd of 6K.
